msg: GERONIMO-5205: Support runtime JPA entity enhancement for OSGi JPA applications (using java agent approach and PU fragment bundles)

msg: Revert most of changes for ARIES-320 as there is a better way for agent support through ManagedPersistenceUnitInfoFactory extensions.
